name: Very Bad Vacation
description:
Two aliens on vacation want to meet the humans of a space base but… Not everything goes as planned… Panic, destruction, enemy attacks, you find yourself in a human ship to fight for your survival … to finally go back on holiday!

For that, two players and one controller!

There were two of us on this two-month unity project. My roles:

- Game Design participation,
- Programming all enemies and bosses,
- Sprites of all enemies and boss,
- Help with level building.

Our goal, that you spend a session between friend fun and full of rebounding!!

Good game!

Created in 2020.
